message_1: Suppose you want to encode the message "HELLO" using the Caesar cipher with a shift of 3. What would be the ciphertext?
message_2:
To encode the message "HELLO" using the Caesar cipher with a shift of 3, you would shift each letter in the message 3 positions forward in the alphabet. 

H -> K
E -> H
L -> O
L -> O
O -> R

The ciphertext would be "KHOOR".
